name: Neu Aviation, LLC
about: Neu Aviation, LLC, is a premier flight school located at the Shreveport Downtown Airport in Louisiana. As a family-owned and operated business, we are dedicated to providing personalized and safe flight training. Our instructors, many of whom are military-trained veterans, bring over 30 years of combined instruction experience and more than 6,000 aircraft hours. We offer a range of programs, including private pilot's licenses, instrument ratings, commercial certificates, and multi-engine ratings. Our fleet includes three Cessna Skyhawks and a Travel Air, all equipped with the latest Garmin avionics. Our maintenance team, staffed by FAA-certified A&P/IA technicians, ensures our aircraft are always in excellent condition. We prioritize safety and proficiency, fostering a community of aviators in the Shreveport-Bossier area. Join us for a discovery flight and start your aviation journey today.
